laboratory_examinations.findings: Leucocytes: 14,090 cells/mm³; Neutrophils: 10,470 cells/mm³; Lymphocytes: 2,560 cells/mm³; C-reactive protein (CRP) value of 5.45 mg/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CRP increased until POD 12 up to 11.36 mg/L.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Decreased blood pH and inversion between O2 and CO2 partial pressures.
POD 8 showed multiple pulmonary consolidations; POD 16 showed a sole remaining opacity in the upper third of the right lung.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction of pulmonary consolidations from POD 8 to POD 16.
